hymn.title: If what I love Thou dost remove

layout.singingstanza: If what I love Thou dost re -- move, Please give Thy -- self to me; If I'm mis -- trust -- ed and re -- proved, Please give Thy -- self to me. Lord Je -- sus, dear -- est Sav -- ior, Give Thy -- self more to me; I'd ful -- ly be o -- be -- dient— Give Thy -- self more to me.

lyrics.stanza: If what I love Thou dost remove, Please give Thyself to me; If I'm mistrusted and reproved, Please give Thyself to me.
If Thou my hope dost dissipate, Please give Thyself to me; Although my feelings fluctuate, Please give Thyself to me.
My ev'ry trust Thou dost remove; Please give Thyself to me. Though ev'ry prayer Thou dost refuse, Please give Thyself to me.
If I must wait another day, Yet give Thyself to me; If Thou Thy coming dost delay, Add Thyself more to me.
